querySql: select order_id,vas_order_id,pay_no,user_id,shop_id,city_market_id,biz_type,order_status,vas_id,replace(replace(replace(`product_name`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),product_type,vas_sku_id,replace(replace(replace(`cycle_name`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),cycle_val,cycle_type,replace(replace(replace(`cycle_start`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),replace(replace(replace(`cycle_end`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),total_pay_fee,pay_type,create_user,update_user,replace(replace(replace(`create_time`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),replace(replace(replace(`update_time`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),replace(replace(replace(`cancel_time`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),replace(replace(replace(`cancel_reason`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),replace(replace(replace(`pay_time`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),replace(replace(replace(`real_cycle_end`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),termination_user,replace(replace(replace(`termination_username`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),replace(replace(replace(`termination_reason`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),owner_user_id,replace(replace(replace(`owner_user_name`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), '') from t_member_shop_order
